description:
HEAVY BARREL is a two-player co-operative game. You and your buddy against the enemy's army!
SUPER BURGER TIME: Play as Peter Pepper Jr. and complete the burgers, but watch out for Mr. Hot Dog, Mr. Egg and the dangerous Mr. Pickle!
name: Retro Classix 2-in-1 : Heavy Barrel & Super BurgerTime
intro: Expect Double Trouble with this pack of 2 classic Data East titles at a great value price!
